p:
Galvanostatic charge/discharge tests were performed in 6M KOH within a voltage window of 0–1 V at different current densities. The gravimetric specific capacitance Cs was estimated using Equation (7) [ 41, 42]:
(7)
C s
= 4 I d t / m Δ v
where I is the applied current,
d t
is the discharging time, m is the total mass (in grams) of the electrode active material,
Δ v
is the operating voltage window. Here again, the factor 4 was used to calculate capacitance for a three electrodes equivalent system.
